title: Who are the most popular Quorans and what are they best at? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am just a very young one but I am trying to narrate about some quorans. Aasees Kaur -Already written about her,she is my favourite.[1]User-9248814863030902883 -He is my favourite male quoran.His answers are short,meaningful,sometimes humor,sometimes knowledge,nice English.Kanwal Sir travelled a lot of countries and had a great experience at the age of 23.Any doubt about Pizza?Donot worry,Kanwal sir there.Any suggestion for looks and dating,Kanwal sir there.Planning trip to Europe,forget google,here is Kanwal sir.His psychological tricks are awesome.Moreover he is best at travelling,dating,pizza,life lessons and some daily hacks.Gopalkrishna Vishwanath - Old is gold.Gopal sir is gold of quora.His advices on life lessons are great.As I know the oldest quoran(in terms of age)he has a great experience.Want to know about 90s in India,just go through his answers.From a pin to a motor bike,every 90s culture are there in his answer.Though I donot know engineering,sometimes I come across his answers on structural engineering.And though I am not an adult legally till now,it is weired to say that he has great suggestions for happily married life.He is the Elephant of our Quora jungle.Shefali Naidu - She is a very very very nice women to walk on the earth.Her thinking generally donot intersect our Indian women type thinkings. She is unique,she is different.Moreover romantic.Her answers as a daughter,as a wife,as a mother are awesome.She is smart and she never hears shits spoken by typical Indians.And she loves panipuri a lot.She is a choreographer too.You can take suggestion on dancing from him.If you are newly married,her suggestions will make you more comfortable with tour spouse.Newly became mother,take her suggestions.Literally she is a nice writer as we all know.Himanshu Chauhan -His unbiased answers fascinates me much.His answers sometime creates humor and sometimes give lessons.Anyway I am new to his writings,so I will add more later.Hamna Younis Bhutta -This quoran had cleared my all doubts and wrong thinking about Pakistan.She belongs to Pakistan but her unbiased answers attracts.Neman Ashraf -Neman sir is a great soul.His writings are just mesmerising ones.He shares his incidents with us.They gives life lessons too.He is a good father also.Ripunjoy Medhi -Here is an IITan brother.He has good sense of humor.His answers are great.I am a silent reader of his answers.And most importantly this writer replys all my comments.I respect you a lot brother.Sean Kernan - Am I required to say about his answers,hell no.Just one word,He is a writing superstar.No one can match his sense of humor.Naindeep Kaur - My sister from another mother.I talk to her daily in comments.She has a sense of humor.Answers are just so good that I have to write something, cute answers,cute eyes,cute smile and happy always.I can say more about her but I will not.Jasmine Ansari -Rising star of quora.She has good answers.I am a new reader of her answers.Thanks for reading. Wish you all happy life my favourite quorans. And a cute life @Naindeep Kaur . . Footnotes[1] Abhijit Tripathy's answer to Who is your favorite popular Quoran and why?
